title: All the Best Furniture Stores Are Having Early Black Friday Sales
description: Just in time for a fall home refresh.
excerpt: Including up to 60 percent off Article, Wayfair, and West Elm.
text: Though it might feel like summer just ended, Thanksgiving is right around the corner. While you finalize your plans for the holiday weekend, make sure to carve out some time to shop the best Black Friday furniture deals. The blowout event famously brings shockingly steep discounts on all things for the home, and in even better news, there are already tons of impeccable markdowns at your disposal.Whether you’re looking to redecorate with a cozy cloud couch dupe or some festive accents this season, here are the absolute best pre-Black Friday furniture deals to snag while they’re hot. AmazonAmazon has all kinds of furniture gems hiding in its depths. html:
Though it might feel like summer just ended, Thanksgiving is right around the corner. While you finalize your plans for the holiday weekend, make sure to carve out some time to shop the best Black Friday furniture deals. The blowout event famously brings shockingly steep discounts on all things for the home, and in even better news, there are already tons of impeccable markdowns at your disposal.

Whether you’re looking to redecorate with a cozy cloud couch dupe or some festive accents this season, here are the absolute best pre-Black Friday furniture deals to snag while they’re hot.

Amazon

Amazon has all kinds of furniture gems hiding in its depths. Right now, you can score up to 40 percent off tons of sleek styles that only look expensive, including a TikTok-viral criss-cross chair slashed to under $60.

Orange Factory Cross Legged Office Desk Chair

Now 45% Off

Umbra Bellwood Bar Cart

Now 28% Off

Vongrasig Convertible Sectional Sofa

Now 17% Off

ChooChoo Mission Coffee Table

Now 23% Off

Urban Shop Super Soft Faux Fur Saucer Chair

Now 20% Off

Allewie Queen Size Platform Bed Frame

Now 40% Off

Burrow

For stylish, modern pieces that stand the test of time, head to Burrow. The brand’s pre-Black Friday sale is already live, with up to 50 percent off hundreds of investment-worthy finds for every room in your home.

Burrow Arch Nomad Sofa

Now 20% Off

Burrow Gimlet Lounge Chair

Now 20% Off

Burrow Dram Bar Cart

Now 20% Off

Burrow New: Harvest Dining Table

Now 20% Off

Burrow Heist Nightstand

Now 20% Off

Burrow Index Wall Shelf

Now 20% Off

Article

Article has become a go-to furniture destination for interior designers and stylish consumers alike thanks to its expansive selection of durable, elegant, and easily customizable styles. Ahead of Black Friday, you can find some of the brand’s most popular silhouettes for up to 40 percent off.

Article Oscuro Dining Chair

Now 40% Off

Article Sven 100" Tufted Velvet Left Sectional

Now 16% Off

Article Level 43" Leather Bench

Now 20% Off

Article Candra 67" Oak Chaise Lounge

Now 30% Off

Article Dako 61" Bench

Now 33% Off

Pactera King Storage Bed - White

Now 39% Off

West Elm

When in doubt, West Elm is the place to head for high-quality, timeless furniture. Right now, select pieces are up to 25 percent off.

West Elm Penn Chair

Now 20% Off

West Elm Mid-Century Closed Nightstand

Now 25% Off

West Elm Cozy Swivel Chair

Now 20% Off

West Elm Mid-Century Drink Table

Now 13% Off

West Elm Haven 2-Piece Bumper Chaise Sectional

Now 20% Off

Best Seller Baltimore Dining Chair

Now 32% Off

Wayfair

Shopping on a budget? Wayfair’s already-low prices just got even more reasonable, with up to 60 percent off everything from dining chairs to dressers.

Sand & Stable Hertford Upholstered Linen Blend Accent Chair

Now 60% Off

Mercury Row Caramel Helmick Double Dresser

Now 46% Off

Willa Arlo Interiors Lundgren Faux Leather Task Chair

Now 56% Off

AllModern Nia Bar & Counter Stool

Now 57% Off

Wade Logan Allysyn 2-Drawer Nightstand

Now 58% Off

AllModern Bennett Upholstered Swivel Barrel Chair

Now 25% Off

Serena & Lily

California-cool lifestyle brand Serena & Lily is in the midst of its best sale of the year. Through December 4, enjoy up to 40 percent off a wide selection of airy furniture and décor, plus free shipping on all orders.

Serena & Lily Carter Counter Stool

Now 26% Off

Serena & Lily Driftway 2-Drawer Console

Now 30% Off

Serena & Lily Dip Dyed Stools

Now 29% Off

Serena & Lily Ellington Side Table

Now 43% Off

Serena & Lily Driftway Dresser

Now 27% Off

Serena & Lily Harbour Cane Bed

Now 26% Off

Valyou

Valyou’s official Black Friday sale is here and includes up to 20 percent off sitewide, which extends to bestsellers like stylish pet-friendly sofas and striking bubble chairs.

Mario Capasa Feathers Sectional

Now 60% Off

Valou Furniture Pumpkin Accent Chair

Now 20% Off

Valyou Furniture Sleek Recliner Chair

Now 20% Off

OHDOME The Charm 2.0 Bed

Now 20% Off

Foundry Hadley Lounge Chair

Now 20% Off

Valou Furnture Onsen Vanity

Now 20% Off

Casterly

During Casterly’s current Black Friday Sale, get $150 off when you spend over $1,500, $280 off when you spend over $2,800, and up to $600 off when you spend at least $4,500. Additionally, save up to 40 percent off thousands of sale items while supplies last.

Casterly Owen Chaise Sectional Sofa

Now 10% Off

Casterly Desmond Leather Armchair

Now 10% Off

Casterly Bradley Extendable Dining Table

Now 10% Off

Casterly Joseph Build-Your-Own Bedroom Set

Now 5% Off

Casterly Bradley Bench

Now 11% Off

Casterly Joseph 6-Drawer Dresser

Now 10% Off

Sundays

For a limited time, score up to 25 percent off Sundays’s ultra-plush sofas and beds—as well as a range of equally lust-worthy, minimalist pieces like wooden bar carts and leather lounge chairs.

Sundays Sunday Sofa

Now 25% Off

Sundays Cloud Bed

Now 25% Off

Sundays Endless Summer Lounge Chair

Now 25% Off

Sundays Easy Edge Bar Cabinet

Now 25% Off

Sundays Union Low Shelf

Now 25% Off

Sundays Sweet Life Sling Lounge Chair With Headrest

Now 25% Off

Soho Home

Soho Home, the furniture brand behind all Soho House décor, is offering steep discounts on its luxury furniture. Right now, members can save hundreds of dollars on select beds, accent chairs, desks, and more.

Soho Home Eldon Dining Chair, Boucle, Oak

Now 40% Off

Soho Home Anuel Desk

Now 31% Off

Soho Home Andrea Compact Bar, Carrara Marble

Now 25% Off

Soho Home Mercer Bed

Now 27% Off

Soho Home Molina Barstool

Now 30% Off

Soho Home Holland Armchair

Now 30% Off

Tatjana Freund is Hearst's Fashion & Luxury Commerce Editor, covering beauty, fashion and more across multiple brands. Previously, she worked at ELLE.com and Marie Claire. She's a fan of whiskey neat, podcasts that give her nightmares, and one time Zoë Kravitz laughed at a joke she made.
